description:
As of Jan 19 2012, there are 410 flags definitions in Nova.

https://gist.github.com/1639355

Provide a tool for listing all options used in Nova.
title: Nova options listing tool

comments.content:
As of Jan 19 2012, there are 335 flags definitions in Nova.

https://gist.github.com/1639355

It would be nice to have a example nova.conf of essential flags with comments explaining its use.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyluo

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/3210
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
FWIW there was an attempt at documenting them here:
http://wiki.openstack.org/FlagsGrouping

but it's probably well out of date now.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
Thanks Thierry, I didn't see that page before.

I was tired of following through the source code whenever there's a new commit, so I made a script myself to pull all flag definitions from the source.

I'll try and update that wiki page.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyluo

comments.content:
Zhongyue:

Would 'nova-manage config list' work for this use case?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince
